actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property

official_title: To amend section 108 of title 17, United States Code, relating to reproduction of works by libraries and archives.

summary.text: Preservation of Orphan Works Act - Provides that the limitation on rights of reproduction and distribution of copyrighted works does not apply to the authority of libraries or archives, during the last 20 years of any term of copyright of a published work to reproduce, distribute, display, or perform in facsimile or digital form a copy or phonorecord of such work for purposes of preservation, scholarship, or research when certain conditions apply.

titles.title: To amend section 108 of title 17, United States Code, relating to reproduction of works by libraries and archives.
